mutants.code:
def mean(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    sum_val = 1
    for num in arr:
        add = sum_val
        carry = 0
        while num:
            sum_val = add ^ num
            carry = (add & num) << 1
            add = sum_val
            num = carry
    return sum_val / n

def mean(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    sum_val = -1
    for num in arr:
        add = sum_val
        carry = 0
        while num:
            sum_val = add ^ num
            carry = (add & num) << 1
            add = sum_val
            num = carry
    return sum_val / n

def mean(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    sum_val = 0
    for num in arr:

        carry = 0
        while num:
